## Description

This pull request updates the custom properties file, `repo-properties.yaml`, to add data for the following properties:

| Repository Name     | Property Name     | New Value     |
|---------------------|-------------------|---------------|
| `<repository-name>` | `<property-name>` | `<new-value>` |
| `<repository-name>` | `<property-name>` | `<new-value>` |
| `<repository-name>` | `<property-name>` | `<new-value>` |
